text: is a franchise created by Sanrio in 2001. The character is from Miyiki okumara. The main character, Cinnamoroll is a young male white puppy with long ears, blue eyes, pink cheeks, a small plump body, and a tail that resembles a cinnamon roll. He starred his own manga, an anime movie and various short animations. == References == == Other websites == * Official site * * Category:Manga series Category:2004 manga Category:2005 manga Category:Comedy anime and manga Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2001 Category:Fictional dogs Category:Madhouse (company) Category:Sanrio characters
title: Cinnamoroll
